version_description:
*ORIGINAL CONTENT: Our new app features even more sections, allowing you to easily navigate our content.
*CUSTOMIZED NEWS: Focus on the stories you really want to read and filter out the ones you don't in the new MY NEWS section.
*GOING LIVE! Our new app features even more content for you to watch live streams, from Chinese New Year festivities to China's latest space launch. We've also got a handy replay function if you missed an important event first time around!
*NEW DESIGN: With an easy-to-navigate new design, it's now even easier for your to go straight to the content that interests you the most.
*MULTILINGUAL: Using the latest in AI technology, our news can now be translated into 4 languages: French, Spanish, Arabic, Russian.

This update is compatible with iPhone X.

*ORIGINAL CONTENT: Our new app features extra sections, allowing easy navigation.
*CUSTOMIZED NEWS: Focus on the stories you really want in the MY NEWS section.
*GOING LIVE! Watch more live-stream content, and use “replay” if you miss an important event!
*NEW DESIGN: The easy-to-navigate design makes browsing content simple.
*MULTILINGUAL: Our news can be translated into French, Spanish, Arabic, and Russian.
